00016 #ifndef thermometerH
00017 #define thermometerH
00018 
00019 #include "xnode.h"
00020 #include "xlistnode.h"
00021 
00022 class XThermometer : public XNode
00023 {
00024     XNODE_OBJECT
00025 protected:
00026     XThermometer(const char *name, bool runtime);
00027 public:
00028     virtual ~XThermometer() {}
00029 
00030     virtual double getTemp(double res) const = 0;
00031     virtual double getRawValue(double temp) const = 0;
00032 
00033     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &tempMin() const {return m_tempMin;} 
00034     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &tempMax() const {return m_tempMax;} 
00035 private:
00036     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_tempMin, m_tempMax;
00037 };
00038 
00039 class XThermometerList : public XCustomTypeListNode<XThermometer>
00040 {
00041     XNODE_OBJECT
00042 protected:
00043     XThermometerList(const char *name, bool runtime);
00044 public:
00045     virtual ~XThermometerList() {}
00046 
00047     DEFINE_TYPE_HOLDER
00048 protected:
00049     virtual shared_ptr<XNode> createByTypename(
00050         const XString &type, const XString &name) {
00051         shared_ptr<XNode> ptr = (*creator(type))(name.c_str(), false);
00052         if(ptr) insert(ptr);
00053         return ptr;
00054     }
00055 };
00056 
00057 class XRawThermometer : public XThermometer
00058 {
00059     XNODE_OBJECT
00060 protected:
00061     XRawThermometer(const char *name, bool runtime) : XThermometer(name, runtime) {}
00062 public:
00063     virtual ~XRawThermometer() {}
00064 
00065     virtual double getTemp(double res) const {return res;}
00066     virtual double getRawValue(double temp) const {return temp;}
00067 };

00070 class XLakeShore : public XThermometer
00071 {
00072     XNODE_OBJECT
00073 protected:
00074     XLakeShore(const char *name, bool runtime);
00075 public:
00076     virtual ~XLakeShore() {}
00077   
00078     double getTemp(double res) const;
00079     double getRawValue(double temp) const;
00080     
00081     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &resMin() const {return m_resMin;}
00082     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &resMax() const {return m_resMax;}
00083     typedef XListNode<XDoubleNode> XDoubleListNode;
00084     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> &zu() const {return m_zu;}
00085     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> &zl() const {return m_zl;}
00086     typedef XListNode<XDoubleListNode> XDouble2DNode;
00087     const shared_ptr<XDouble2DNode> &ai() const {return m_ai;}
00088 private:
00089     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_resMin, m_resMax;
00090     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> m_zu, m_zl;
00091     const shared_ptr<XDouble2DNode> m_ai;
00092 
00093 };

00095 class XScientificInstruments : public XThermometer
00096 {
00097 public:
00098     XScientificInstruments(const char *name, bool runtime);
00099     virtual ~XScientificInstruments() {}
00100 
00101     double getTemp(double res) const;
00102     double getRawValue(double temp) const;
00103 
00104     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &resMin() const {return m_resMin;}
00105     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &resMax() const {return m_resMax;}
00106     typedef XListNode<XDoubleNode> XDoubleListNode;
00107     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> &abcde() const {return m_abcde;}
00108     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> &abc() const {return m_abc;}
00109     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &rCrossover() const {return m_rCrossover;}
00110 private:
00111     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_resMin, m_resMax;
00112     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> m_abcde, m_abc;
00113     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_rCrossover;    
00114 };

00116 class CSplineApprox;
00117 //! Cubic (natural) spline approximation.
00118 class XApproxThermometer : public XThermometer
00119 {
00120 public:
00121     XApproxThermometer(const char *name, bool runtime);
00122 
00123     double getTemp(double res) const;
00124     double getRawValue(double temp) const;
00125 
00126     typedef XListNode<XDoubleNode> XDoubleListNode;
00127     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> &resList() const {return m_resList;}
00128     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> &tempList() const {return m_tempList;}  
00129 private:
00130     const shared_ptr<XDoubleListNode> m_resList, m_tempList;
00131     mutable atomic_shared_ptr<CSplineApprox> m_approx, m_approx_inv;
00132 };
